product_name: REI Flip-Top Vacuum Bottle - 20 fl. oz.
long_description: The REI Flip-Top vacuum bottle is an essential for cold-weather adventures. Made of premium stainless steel, this vacuum bottle will keep your drink nice and warm while you head out and play. Double-wall vacuum construction is made with premium stainless steel that is BPA free; double-wall construction keeps drinks hot or cold for hours. Easy-access flip top and a push-button thermal stopper let you grab a quick drink while on the go. Food-grade plastic sipping collar is shaped so liquids flow easily from mug to mouth. Hand wash; do not microwave. The REI Flip-Top vacuum bottle holds 20 fl. oz.
short_description: The REI Flip-Top vacuum bottle is an essential for cold-weather adventures. Made of premium stainless steel, this vacuum bottle will keep your drink nice and warm while you head out and play.
